senses.sense_definition: A small island in the Inner Hebrides, Scotland, known as a historic center of Christianity.

examples.text: Many pilgrims travel to <w>Iona</w> to visit the historic abbey and experience its peace.
The small island of <w>Iona</w> played a crucial role in the spread of Christianity throughout Scotland.
My aunt <w>Iona</w> has lived in Edinburgh for her entire life.
We decided to call the baby <w>Iona</w> after the beautiful place where we met.
